text: 16.17-18: FG 2.4; 5.16; 8.7; 10.46; 1 Ko 12.10; 12.2816.17-18: Ru 10.19; FG 5.15-16; 28.3-9; Ze 5.14-15Mbe mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ khothivi ntɨɨri, kha tɨv mben kɨrga. Mbe na zɨn panan ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharav, mbe vhɨra harigi ŋguir kaar buni suaŋv, mbe kurugir suigɨv, mbe vhɨra thiŋgi mbɨn mbɨrga, mba mbɨ gum kurigi vhɨra mben farfagirga tuktɨgi fhu. Mbe vhɨra wari wo farir rɨɨi gumgi ga surga, mben rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨrga.”
